availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Knorr (Newport, Kentucky farmer and felon)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky farmer imprisoned in the Kentucky State Penitentiary. Bavaria native. Married Sophia Knorr. Convicted of manslaughter in Campbell County, Kentucky in c1861 for the murder of his brother-in-law, M. Hidesman.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell county, Newport p. 214. KYR-0001-020-1474. KYR-0001-020-1472. KYR-0001-020-1473.
